title: Crimson Pythons Besiege · Leopard Raptors Appear

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and scroll unfurl effects

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, drifting spiritual particles, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第8集:赤蟒围城·豹禽现身。

scenes.description: 七轮弯月升起,青狼尸体铺满城下,狼嚎渐远。

visual.composition: Seven crescent moons rise above wolf corpses blanketing the base of the wall while howls fade

scenes.prompt: Seven crescent moons ascend over the wall as azure wolf bodies carpet the ground and distant howls fade.
scenes.narration: 夜色下狼群哀鸣撤离,第一日攻势暂告一段落。

scenes.description: 士兵筋疲力尽瘫坐,肖军官阻止他们倒头睡去。

visual.composition: Exhausted soldiers slump down while Officer Xiao stops them from collapsing into sleep

scenes.prompt: Spent soldiers sag where they sit as Officer Xiao barks at them to stay upright and vigilant.
scenes.narration: 他命众人站好阵脚，等换防后再休息，保持警惕。

scenes.description: 张奎感谢韩立救下指挥官,满身血迹仍神情敬服。

visual.composition: Bloodstained Zhang Kui thanks Han Li for saving the commander, awe etched across his face

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui, still spattered with blood, bows his head to Han Li for rescuing the commander.
scenes.narration: 张奎坦言若无韩立,此段守军怕已全灭。

scenes.description: 张奎暗示韩立金刚诀不止第三层,话锋戛然而止。

visual.composition: Zhang Kui hints that Han Li's Vajra Art surpasses the third layer before cutting himself off

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui drops a remark about Han Li's Vajra Art being beyond the third layer, then stops mid-sentence.
scenes.narration: 他似有所指,笑言韩立前途远大便离开。

scenes.description: 新兵轮换上墙,天东商号众人卸下甲胄,顺梯而下。

visual.composition: Fresh soldiers take the wall as the Tiandong caravan removes armor and descends the ladder

scenes.prompt: New troops climb up to relieve the line while the Tiandong guards strip armor and shuffle down the stairs.
scenes.narration: 换防到来,大家拖着疲惫身躯离开城墙。

scenes.description: 石屋里护卫倒头大睡,韩立安静端坐调息。

visual.composition: Guards collapse into sleep inside the stone room while Han Li sits quietly regulating his breath

scenes.prompt: Inside the stone quarters the guards drop asleep as Han Li remains seated and calm, cycling his breathing.
scenes.narration: 同伴熟睡，他仍闭目参悟金刚诀，继续修炼不辍。

scenes.description: 钟鸣再起,第二日厮杀声从远方滚滚传来。

visual.composition: The bells ring again as the roar of second-day battle rolls in from afar

scenes.prompt: The bells sound once more and the clamour of the second day's fighting rumbles from the distant walls.
scenes.narration: 第二日清晨钟鼓齐鸣,城头再度传来杀声。

scenes.description: 傍晚换防士兵满身毒疮归来,哀声诉说新变异狼。

visual.composition: Relief soldiers return at dusk covered in poisonous sores, lamenting a new mutant wolf

scenes.prompt: At dusk the relieved soldiers stagger back covered in toxic sores, crying about a new venomous wolf mutation.
scenes.narration: 他们口中提及射毒小狼,让所有人心惊。

scenes.description: 韩立静立门口,看见大批伤兵抬入石屋仍面无波澜。

visual.composition: Han Li stands quietly at the doorway, unfazed as wounded are carried into the stone hut
visual.character_pose: Han Li standing at the entrance

scenes.prompt: Han Li stands at the doorway, expression unchanged while waves of injured men are borne inside.
scenes.narration: 再惨烈的消息也未动摇他,只回房继续静坐。

scenes.description: 第三日拂晓,银甲统领召集精锐于广场集合。

visual.composition: At daybreak on the third day the silver-armored commander gathers the elite in the plaza

scenes.prompt: Third-day dawn: the silver-armored commander calls the picked troops to assemble on the plaza.
scenes.narration: 统领宣布赤蟒防线告急,命他们火速支援。

scenes.description: 兽车纵横驰骋,狻狼骑士护送队伍穿城而行。

visual.composition: Beast carts speed through the streets while the suanni wolf riders escort the column

scenes.prompt: Beast-drawn wagons thunder across the city as wolf riders flank the team en route to the front.
scenes.narration: 队伍穿过空旷街巷,直奔城另一端。

scenes.description: 抵达北墙,城楼毁损残破,地面一片漆黑。

visual.composition: Upon reaching the north wall they see shattered battlements and ground stained pitch black

scenes.prompt: They reach the north battlement to find the parapets ruined and the earth charred jet black.
scenes.narration: 众人望着被毒雾腐蚀的垛口,尽皆色变。

scenes.description: 大胡子军官讲述飞蛇喷毒,地面仍散发腐臭。

visual.composition: The bearded officer describes the venom-spitting flying serpents as the ground still reeks

scenes.prompt: A bearded officer recounts how flying snakes spewed poison, the earth still exuding foul fumes.
scenes.narration: 他说飞蛇一次毒雾便要休养,但破坏力惊人。

scenes.description: 众人感叹赤蟒凶猛,又问修士缘何不露面。

visual.composition: The guards lament the ferocity of the scarlet pythons and wonder why cultivators remain unseen

scenes.prompt: They marvel at the crimson pythons' savagery and question why the cultivators have yet to appear.
scenes.narration: 有人忧心修士不出手,大胡子提醒豹禽未现。

scenes.description: 怪异鸣叫自远空传来,所有炼体士握紧兵器。

visual.composition: Strange cries echo from the far sky and every body cultivator grips their weapon

scenes.prompt: An eerie screech rolls across the sky, prompting every body-tempering warrior to tighten their grip.
scenes.narration: 豹禽鸣声震得气血翻滚,人人面色大变。

scenes.description: 城中心飞出上百道遁光,修士御器升空迎敌。

visual.composition: Hundreds of escape lights burst from the city center as cultivators ride their artifacts skyward

scenes.prompt: Over a hundred streaks of light launch from the city core, cultivators ascending on artifacts to meet the foe.
scenes.narration: 筑基修士总算御器而出,空中对上豹禽群。

scenes.description: 豹禽喷出绿雾,修士以符雷火术迎击,双方僵持。

visual.composition: Leopard raptors spray green mists while cultivators answer with talisman thunderfire, locked in stalemate

scenes.prompt: Leopard aviary beasts spew viridian fog as the cultivators counter with talismanic thunderfire, the aerial duel deadlocked.
scenes.narration: 空战胶着,妖羽与灵器互射,迟迟难分胜负。

scenes.description: 地面赤蟒连成巨弩般弹射上墙,士兵举盾严防。

visual.composition: Scarlet pythons braid together like a giant crossbow and fling themselves up the wall as soldiers raise shields

scenes.prompt: Crimson pythons lash together and catapult up the battlements while soldiers brace behind shields.
scenes.narration: 十余条赤蟒互咬成弓,弹射上墙发动猛攻。

scenes.description: 巨弩怒射丈许铁箭,将多段蟒蛇贯穿摔落。

visual.composition: Great ballistae hurl yard-long iron bolts that skewer chains of pythons and hurl them down

scenes.prompt: Massive ballistae spit yard-long iron bolts, pinning linked pythons and flinging them from the wall.
scenes.narration: 巨弩火力全开,连结的蟒蛇被贯穿摔回城下。

scenes.description: 一条变异巨蟒混入城头,韩立闪身挥刀将其斩首。

visual.composition: A mutant giant python slips onto the rampart and Han Li flashes forward to sever its head

scenes.prompt: A mutant giant python breaches the wall only for Han Li to dart in and behead it with a single slash.
scenes.narration: 巨蟒冲入阵中,韩立冷刀一闪,蟒首化作血雾。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night as spiritual light rains from the sky
visual.environment: Night sky, immortal city outline, drifting spirit motes

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第9集即将开始。
